name: Cloud Threat Research Developer
description:
About the Company

Huawei Technologies Co. Ltd. is a leading global ICT solution provider. Huawei's smartphone market share was ranked among Top-3 in the world in 2020. As part of Huawei Consumer Business Group, Huawei Mobile Service delivers high-quality digital content & mobile services to consumers. Our products consist of AppGallery, Petal Search, Browser, Game Center, Themes, Video, Music, Reader, HiCloud, etc. Huawei Mobile Service serves over 600 million customers in 170 countries. (More information please refer to https://huaweimobileservices.com/).

Job Description:

CBG Cloud Service Competence Center is looking for a Threat Research Developer to join a rapidly growing team of experts who defines the next generation of Huawei’s Threat Prevention technologies and protects millions of HMS-services users.

Responsibilities:

  • Perform researches, evaluations and investigations into new and emerging cyber-protection trends and technologies.
  • Develop algorithms and prototypes of innovative protection solutions for Huawei’s IOT, Mobile and Cloud systems to detect cyber threats and to protect the consumer’s personal privacy.
  • Build ML-based solutions among the team of other Threat Researchers, Data Scientists and Developers.
  • Make the world more safe! Help build the next generation of protection technologies stacks across Huawei’s growing device and wireless infrastructure ecosystems.

Professional knowledge requirements:

  • Master of Computer Science or Mathematics or IS.
  • Experience in Python (possession of Java or C++ will be plus).
  • Practical R&D experience in the one of: anti-malware, anti-fraud, content filtering, privacy protection.
  • Software development experience in a Linux-based environment.
  • Ability to analyze quickly and understand key concepts in scientific publications and industry technical documents.
  • English, sufficient for oral and written communication with foreign colleagues (Intermediate or above).

Optional Qualifications Considered an Asset:

  • Ph.D. or Ph.D.-student
  • Strong background in mathematics, statistics and algorithms.
  • Understanding of network protocols, experience with network traffic analysis tools.
  • Reverse engineering experience.
  • Interest or knowledge in one or more of the following topics: OS/kernel protection, container/sandbox isolation, authentication, data anonymization, access control, PKI.
  • Knowledge of trusted execution environments (TEE) such as ARM Trust Zone or Intel SGX.

Conditions:

  • Professional and career development opportunity;
  • Commercial medical insurance;
  • Modern office in the city center;
  • Employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation.
